page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There has been a{decline in {agricultural work}- 17% of great- grandfathers,3.5% of grandfathers and 0.5% of fathers work(ed) on the land. In all three generations the{largest {proportion of men worked in {manufacturing industries.}Cotton mills have now ceased working but fathers can travel further to factories by car and train. Since great-grandfathers worked in the mills there has been a{marked {decline in women factory workers}-eg. 33% great-grandmothers,9% grandmothers and 2% mothers. For the past 2 generations 53% grandmothers and 50% mothers have worked in{service industries}eg. office workers, home helps etc. Many more women work in the{public {sector}-8% gt-grandmothers,16% grandmothers and 35% mothers.
